text:
Producer-san, about the decorations for the livestream...
If I bought too much, I'll cover the cost myself...!

No, no, this should be fine.
It's amazing how much you can get at the 100-yen shop.

When seasonal items come out, you have to buy them
right away because popular ones sell out quickly.

Is that so...!
Thank you for going shopping.

During the livestream, if there are decorations around,
it might make it more enjoyable for viewers...

That's right, even small things
can get everyone excited.

Then, it might also become
a topic of conversation during the talk...!
